conditions.label: ANYTIME

Flexible ticket with no time restrictions on when you can travel. If the ticket includes Rail & Sail, then rail travel to/from Stranraer plus connecting ferry crossing(s) to/from Belfast with Stenaline is included.
Your journey must be on the date, or the day after the date, specified on the ticket
There is no advance purchase requirement associated with this ticket. Rail & Sail Anytime tickets are subject to availability based on ferry capacity only up to the close of reservations.
Refunds are available, subject to a GBP10.00 administration fee on unused tickets surrendered up to 28 days after expiry of the ticket.
Travel plans can be changed before the outward journey subject to a GBP10.00 administration fee.
Yes normal Railcard and child discounts apply, with the exception of Rail & Sail tickets where only Senior and 16 - 25 Railcard discounts and child discounts apply.
You may start, break and resume, or end your journey at any intermediate station along the route.
Rail & Sail Anytime tickets are available for Standard Class travel only.  Upgrades to First Class are not available. Weekend First supplements are not valid with Rail & Sail Anytime tickets.
Mobile Tickets and etickets aren't valid for travel on London Underground. See our FAQs for more info.
ANYTIME

Flexible ticket with no time restrictions on when you can travel. If the ticket includes Rail & Sail, then rail travel to/from Stranraer plus connecting ferry crossing(s) to/from Belfast with Stenaline is included.
Your journey must be on the date, or the day after the date, specified on the ticket
There is no advance purchase requirement associated with this ticket. Rail & Sail Anytime tickets are subject to availability based on ferry capacity only up to the close of reservations.
Refunds are available, subject to a GBP10.00 administration fee on unused tickets surrendered up to 28 days after expiry of the ticket.
Travel plans can be changed before the outward journey subject to a GBP10.00 administration fee.
Yes normal Railcard and child discounts apply, with the exception of Rail & Sail tickets where only Senior and 16 - 25 Railcard discounts and child discounts apply.
You may start, break and resume, or end your journey at any intermediate station along the route.
Rail & Sail Anytime tickets are available for Standard Class travel only.  Upgrades to First Class are not available. Weekend First supplements are not valid with Rail & Sail Anytime tickets.
Mobile Tickets and etickets aren't valid for travel on London Underground. See our FAQs for more info.
ANYTIME
Flexible ticket with no time restrictions on when you can travel.
Your outward journey must be on the date specified or up to 5 days later. You must return within one calendar month of the outward travel date specified.
Can be booked in advance or purchased on the day of travel.

If you decide not to use your ticket to make all or part of your intended journey then you can apply for a refund from the My Account pages, or through Customer Support within 28 days of expiry of the ticket. Please note, the outward portion cannot be refunded if the return portion has been used. A GBP 10.00 administration fee will apply and the amount of the refund will take into account any use you have made of the ticket and in some circumstances no refund will be paid.

You can change the time of your outward journey and the date and time of your return journey without changing your tickets. If you wish to change your date of travel or Class of ticket, you will need to buy a new ticket and apply for a refund on your current ticket.
Yes - normal railcard and child discounts available.
You may start, break and resume, or end your journey at any intermediate station along the route of travel.
The outward portion of an Anytime Return ticket is only valid for travel when accompanied by an unused return portion.
Mobile Tickets and etickets aren't valid for travel on London Underground. See our FAQs for more info.
